Structure
LinkIdTextCardinalityTypeDescription & Constraints
Questionnairehttps://voicecollab.ai/fhir/Questionnaire/VbaiQuestionnaireDemographicExample#1.0.0
generalnull0..1group
countryCountry of survery completed0..1choiceValue Set: Country
dobwhat is your date of birth?0..1date
addressPatient address0..1string
completed_byWho is completing this survey?0..1choiceValue Set: whocompletedsurvey
Proficenciesnull0..1group
language_primaryWhat is your PRIMARY language spoken at home?0..1open-choiceValue Set: Language codes with language and optionally a region modifier
Options: 1 option
language_otherDo you speak an additional language(s) fluently (similar to a native speaker)? Choose all that apply0..1open-choiceValue Set: Language codes with language and optionally a region modifier
Options: 1 option
readCan you read?0..1choiceValue Set: Yes/No/Some
writeCan you write?0..1choiceValue Set: Yes/No/Some
smartdevice_useCan you use a smart device?0..1choiceValue Set: Yes/No/Some
smartdevice_accessDo you have access to a smart device on a regular basis?0..1choiceValue Set: hl7VS-yes-no-Indicator
survey_dateDate Completed0..1date
insuranceInsurance Status0..1string
Idenificationnull0..1group
gender_identityWhat is your gender identity?0..1open-choiceValue Set: Gender Identity
Options: 2 options
birth_sexWhat is your sex assigned at birth?0..1choiceValue Set: Birth Sex
sexual_orientationWhat is your sexual orientation?0..1open-choiceValue Set: US Core Sexual Orientation
ethnicityWhat is your ethnicity? Choose all that apply0..1open-choiceValue Set: Detailed ethnicity
raceWhat is your race? Choose all that apply0..1open-choiceValue Set: Detailed Race
education_completedWhat is your highest level of education?0..1choiceValue Set: Highest form of Education
disabilityDisability0..1group
disability_statusWhat is your disability status?0..1choiceValue Set: Disability Status
disability_typeWhat types of disability(s) do you experience? Please choose all that apply0..1choiceValue Set: Disability Type
disability_labelPlease specify your disability(s)? Consider those that are visible to others and those that are not visible to others.0..1string
six_disability_questionsPlease complete the following questions. Documentation: https://www2.census.gov/programs-surveys/acs/methodology/questionnaires/2023/quest23.pdf AND https://www2.census.gov/programs-surveys/acs/tech_docs/subject_definitions/2021_ACSSubjectDefinitions.pdf (page 61)0..1group
disability_Q1Are you deaf, or do you have serious difficulty hearing?0..1choiceValue Set: hl7VS-yes-no-Indicator
disability_Q2Are you blind, or do you have serious difficulty seeing, even when wearing glasses?0..1choiceValue Set: hl7VS-yes-no-Indicator
disability_Q3Because of a physical, mental, or emotional condition, do you have serious difficulty concentrating, remembering, or making decisions? (5 years old or older)0..1choiceValue Set: hl7VS-yes-no-Indicator
disability_Q4Do you have serious difficulty walking or climbing stairs? (5 years old or older)0..1choiceValue Set: hl7VS-yes-no-Indicator
disability_Q5Do you have difficulty dressing or bathing? (5 years old or older)0..1choiceValue Set: hl7VS-yes-no-Indicator
disability_Q6Because of a physical, mental, or emotional condition, do you have difficulty doing errands alone such as visiting a doctor’s office or shopping? (15 years old or older)0..1choiceValue Set: hl7VS-yes-no-Indicator
employment_statusWhat is your employment status? Choose all that apply 0..1choiceValue Set: Employment Status
employment_typeWhat is your occupation?0..1string
veteran_statusAre you a veteran?0..1choiceValue Set: hl7VS-yes-no-Indicator
estimated_incomeWhat is your estimated annual household income?0..1integer
financial_assistanceDo you take advantage of an income assistance program?0..1choiceValue Set: Yes/No/Some
immigration_statusWhat is your immigration status?0..1choiceValue Set: Immigration Status
marital_statusWhat is your marital status? Choose all that apply0..1choiceValue Set: Marital Status
housing_statusWhat is your current housing status?0..1choiceValue Set: Household Status
household_sizeHow many people live in your household? Please specify number0..1integer
household_makeupWho lives with you? Choose all that apply0..1open-choiceValue Set: Household Makeup
transportation_statusDo you have a reliable mode of transportation?0..1choiceValue Set: hl7VS-yes-no-Indicator
transportation_typeWhat is your primary mode of transportation?0..1open-choiceValue Set: Transportation Type

Documentation for this format

Option Sets

Answer options for language_primary

  • Other, Please specify

Answer options for language_other

  • Other, Please specify

Answer options for gender_identity

  • Not listed, Please Specify
  • Intersex, Please Specify
